items.sentence: I think that you should know that whatever happens, I\'ll still love you.
I think you should know that no matter what you do, I\'ll still love you.
If you want your workers to be happy, you need to pay them a decent wage.
I only eat meat from animals that I have personally killed and butchered.
I had to catch the first train this morning in order to get here in time.
I held onto the rope for as long as I could, but I finally had to let go.
I overheard Tom and Mary speaking French to each other just before class.
I wanted to let you know about that, but Tom told me not to say anything.
Why don\'t you look into the problem yourself? It\'s your responsibility.
A lot of people are going to tell you that you shouldn\'t have done that.
